description.p: The magic sword thrust into Vineblossom is imbued with dark magic. It grants no bonus to attack or damage.
Anyone who attempts to carry the sword without being attuned must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened, as if affected by the antipathy spell.

Curse: After attuning to this sword, the bearer finds that no plant life will grow in their presence. The grass they sleep upon is dead in the morning; anything they plant withers instantly; spending a week in the same place causes surrounding plants and crops to wither away.
Only remove curse, greater restoration, or similar magic can end the attunement and effect.
